source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.
source_objects.title: Communication

items.title: CEO-level Presentation Skills - Slide Writing for Consulting

items.headline: Learn presentation skills from former strategy consultant, create slides meeting the standards of top consulting firms
objectives_summary: Create slide presentations, meeting standards of top management consulting firms
Write a storyline for your presentation, effectively bringing your message across
Create structure in your presentation using tracker elements and other established tools

items.title: Solid Foundations in Intercultural Communication
items.headline: Core insights into what culture is, how it influences our worldview and what it means for successfully working globally.
objectives_summary: After the course, students will be able to better identify their own cultural set up and be able to see, address and constructively work with cultural diversity.

items.title: Embracing a Culture of Feedback
items.headline: Master the art of giving and receiving feedback and enabling a culture of continuous improvement, everyday.
objectives_summary: Conquer your anxiety about giving or receiving feedback so that it becomes second nature
Identify feedback style in yourself and others
Recognize the benefits of feedback, and the consequence of not generously offering it

items.title: Storytelling for Persuasion and Transformation
items.headline: Amaze, Persuade and Inspire Your Audience with The Power of Storytelling
objectives_summary: How Stories can Persuade and Impact your Audience
How to Deal with Your Own Anxiety and Fears on Stage
How to Craft Short Persuasive Stories

items.title: Business Writing For Busy People

visible_instructors.title: Clare Lynch
visible_instructors.job_title: Cambridge University writing tutor & professional copywriter

items.headline: Write clearly and compellingly - for colleagues, clients and other key stakeholders
objectives_summary: Work out what you want to say quickly and painlessly
Craft clear, concise, compelling business documents - from emails to reports
Grab and keep your readers' attention with powerful messages

items.title: Storytelling for Public Speaking
items.headline: Inspire, Engage and Persuade your Audiences With Powerful Storytelling and Expressive Public Speaking
objectives_summary: You will fully grasp the power of your story so that you can move the hearts of your audience
You will learn how to genuinely craft and archive inspiring stories from your personal experience
You will master the art of telling stories that will keep your audience on the edge of their seats

items.headline: Minute Taking: making the taking of notes/minutes at formal and informal meetings easier
objectives_summary: After this workshop, you'll be able to:
determine what to record and what to ignore
understand how privacy legislation impacts minutes

items.title: Public Speaking & Communicating: Skip Theory, Master the Art

objectives_summary: Deliver unforgettable stories with these 10 essential ingredients

Use words that are worth a thousand pictures

visible_instructors.title: David Nihill

items.headline: Quick, easy & fun steps to become a more engaging presenter with proven techniques from the world of stand-up comedy.
objectives_summary: How to Replicate Top TED Talks & Speakers
Effective Memory Techniques so you Never Go Blank on Stage
How to Become a Great Storyteller

items.title: People Skills. How people tick & how to read them instantly!
items.headline: Use simple psychology to build your people and relationship skills, whether selling, influencing or building confidence.
objectives_summary: Understand how 'Psychometrics' can help in business and personal life
Gain practical insights into how people tick by understanding self and others better
Learn a simple, colurful model of human behaviour based on Jungian psychology

items.headline: Learn how to effectively plan, run, & manage meetings of any kind. Increase your team's productivity & participation
objectives_summary: Understand the different kinds of meetings you could have and the goals you could accomplish with them
Set their own goals, create their own agendas, and make effective meeting plans and arrangements
Know when to use slides and how best to create them

items.title: [2021] Customer Service 2.0: Learn Digital Customer Service

visible_instructors.title: Eazl (Official)

visible_instructors.title: Ludell Jones
visible_instructors.job_title: COO of Eazl, Winner of Udemy Innovation Award
visible_instructors.name: Ludell

items.headline: Used by Chase®, Intel®, & more! Learn soft skills, social media customer service, diagnosing user problems, & more.
objectives_summary: Use the IPX system to diagnose and solve customer issues in a community-first context that’s appropriate for the social media era
Mirror tone and provide social customer care for a global base of digitally-connected users
Monitor your brand on social media, blogs, and other digital channels

items.title: Winning Communication Skills for Telephone, Conference Calls
items.headline: Improve Communication Skills - Use the Telephone Effectively! Avoid Phone Etiquette Blunders that Annoy
objectives_summary: Communicate effectively using the phone with clients, customers, colleagues and bosses
Avoid telephone blunders that strike others as rude and unprofessional
Speak effectively on business conference calls

items.title: Inclusive Leadership: Working with Equality and Diversity
items.headline: Gain the emotional intelligence skills to make you a successful inclusive leader in today’s global economy.
objectives_summary: Identify how working with equality, diversity and inclusion can lead to better outcomes within the organisations that you work with
Develop the 6 key traits of inclusive leaders
Discover how unconscious bias works and how to work with others with bias

items.title: IELTS 9: Speaking Mastery
items.headline: Superpower Your IELTS Speaking Score by Mastering Advanced Conversation Skills
objectives_summary: This course is designed to help you boost your IELTS speaking score and thus raise your overall result. It's taught by Misa Zhang, a top sales executive, and a non-native speaker who achieved a band 9 in her IELTS speaking test. In the program, you’ll learn not only the “technical skills” demanded in the official IELTS scoring criteria, but also the critical “people skills” Misa perfected during 10 years as a sales professional for top global companies, such as Dow Jones, The Wall Street Journal, Thomson Reuters and Wood McKenzie. In this intensive 1.5 hour course, you’ll discover the secrets to her success — not only in the IELTS examination but in building a rewarding life in a major English-speaking country.
